name: Adhyatmic Vikas Siksha Sanstha
briefDescription: Our work to provide education to the children of underprivileged section of society. we give them Montessori environment and they teach themselves with joy, freedom and happiness. We have 65 children in our two institutes in Delhi. We also provide health Support to the families and educate them for keeping their home environment happy and healthy by organising monthly workshops on various topics.
